meanings.definition: A South American shrub with red roots used in medicine and dyeing.
meanings.sent1: The rhatany plant grows in South America.
meanings.sent2: People use rhatany roots for their medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rhatany shrub go to the doctor? It needed some medicine!
meanings.sent4: The vibrant red color of rhatany roots is like a beacon in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The red roots of the rhatany shrub stand out against the green leaves.

meanings.definition: The dried root of this shrub, used as an astringent and tonic.
meanings.sent1: After drying, rhatany becomes a powerful astringent.
meanings.sent2: Many people use rhatany as a tonic for their health.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rhatany root go to the gym? It wanted to be a strong tonic!
meanings.sent4: The effects of rhatany on the body are like a refreshing tonic.
meanings.sent5: Using rhatany as a tonic can make you feel revitalized.
